description: This beautiful small city in Bosnia and Herzegovina has it all: gorgeous natural surroundings, great architecture and a very rich (yet tough) history. It’s a must visit for any traveller who wants to visit the more unknown pearls of Europe.
One of the cutest and prettiest cities of Europe, Lviv combines beautiful architecture with a true Eastern feel. You simply cannot skip visiting Lviv on your next Eurotrip!
This city needs no introduction. You’ll find anything here: from history, to architecture, to culture and many more. Berlin is a truly unique modern city for anyone who visits it.

Belgrade is another (slightly) hidden gem within the Balkan region of Europe. It’s a large city for European standards, but the city center feels nice and homely. A city where you can taste the real Serbian spirit(s) – especially at night!
You will certainly love visiting Lisbon. The Portuguese capital can be described no else as authentic, fun and beautiful!
